parameters.name: AggregatorTag
parameters.label: Aggregator Tag
parameters.description: Tag name for the RI potential by tag value analysis for a specific size/ISF group

content.json: Consumption data is updated once every 24 hours and is presented in the currency of your Azure consumption agreement.
If below tiles are reporting query errors, you must set up Pricesheet exports. See more details [here](https://aka.ms/AzureOptimizationEngine/commitmentssetup).

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://isfratio.blob.core.windows.net/isfratio/ISFRatio.csv"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and todatetime(Date_s) < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines'
| join kind=leftouter (
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2d)
    | where ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | distinct SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName=ContainerName_s, Cloud=Cloud_s
) on SubscriptionId
| where Cloud == 'AzureCloud'
| extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
| where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s)['ServiceType'])
| extend SKUName = strcat(VMSize, ' ', ResourceLocation_s)
| project Date_s, QtyHours=todouble(Quantity_s), BillingMeter=MeterName_s, ResourceLocation_s, MeterId=MeterId_g, ResourceId, OnDemandPrice=todouble(iif(todouble(UnitPrice_s) > 0.0, UnitPrice_s, EffectivePrice_s)), SubscriptionName, VMSize, SKUName
| join kind=leftouter ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| extend ISFGroup = strcat(ISFGroup, ' ', ResourceLocation_s)
| extend OnDemandCost = QtyHours * OnDemandPrice
| summarize DailyCost=sum(OnDemandCost) by bin(todatetime(Date_s), 1d), iif("{UseISF}" == "Yes", ISFGroup, SKUName)
| order by DailyCost
content.title: Average on-demand (PAYG) daily consumption (actual cost - Virtual Machines only)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and ResourceLocation_s !startswith 'china'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
| where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
| extend VMSize=tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ResourceLocation_s = tolower(ResourceLocation_s)
| where isnotempty(VMSize)
| summarize UsedQuantity = sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by ResourceId, Date_s, VMSize, ResourceLocation_s
| summarize RIPotential=sum(UsedQuantity/24), AvgSizeUsageHours=avg(UsedQuantity) by Date_s, VMSize, ResourceLocation_s
| summarize RIPotential=round(avg(RIPotential),1), AvgSizeUsageHours=round(avg(AvgSizeUsageHours)) by VMSize, ResourceLocation_s
| extend Fragmentation = case(AvgSizeUsageHours >= 24.0, 0.0, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 18.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 24.0, 0.25, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 12.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 18.0, 0.5, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 6.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 12.0, 0.75, 1.0)
| project-reorder VMSize, ResourceLocation_s, RIPotential, Fragmentation
| order by Fragmentation asc, RIPotential desc

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| extend VMSize=tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ResourceLocation_s = tolower(ResourceLocation_s)
| extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
| where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
| where VMSize == '{VMSize}' and ResourceLocation_s == '{Location}'
| summarize UsedQuantity = round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s)/24)) by todatetime(Date_s)
| extend RIPotential = {RIPotential}
| render timechart

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
| where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
| extend VMSize=tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ResourceLocation_s = tolower(ResourceLocation_s)
| where VMSize == '{VMSize}' and ResourceLocation_s == '{Location}'
| summarize UsedQuantity = sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by Date_s, ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| summarize AvgUsedQuantity = round(avg(UsedQuantity),1) by ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | project SubscriptionName=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder ResourceId, SubscriptionName
| extend AvgUsedVMs = AvgUsedQuantity / 24
| order by ResourceId asc

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
| where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
| extend VMSize=tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ResourceLocation_s = tolower(ResourceLocation_s)

| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))

content.query:
let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandPrice;
AzureOptimizationReservationsPriceV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| where armSkuName_s =~ '{VMSize}' and tolower(armRegionName_s) =~ '{Location}'
| extend reservationUnitPrice = iif(reservationTerm_s == '1 Year', todouble(unitPrice_s)/12/730, todouble(unitPrice_s)/3/12/730)
| project unitPrice_s, reservationUnitPrice, currencyCode_s, reservationTerm_s, armSkuName_s, armRegionName_s
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
    | where ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and ResourceLocation_s !startswith 'china'
    | extend PricingModel = iif(isnotempty(PricingModel_s), PricingModel_s, iif(isnotempty(ReservationName_s), 'Reservation', iif(MeterName_s endswith 'Spot', 'Spot', iif(isnotempty(benefitName_s), 'SavingsPlan', 'OnDemand'))))
    | where PricingModel == 'OnDemand'
    | extend armSkuName_s=tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
    | extend armRegionName_s = tolower(ResourceLocation_s)
    | extend UnitPrice=todouble(iif(todouble(UnitPrice_s) > 0.0, UnitPrice_s, EffectivePrice_s))
    | distinct armSkuName_s, armRegionName_s, MeterId_g
    | join kind=inner ( OnDemandPriceSheet ) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
    | summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=max(OnDemandPrice) by armSkuName_s, armRegionName_s
) on armRegionName_s, armSkuName_s
| extend savingsPercentage =  (1 - reservationUnitPrice / OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| extend commitmentCost = todouble(unitPrice_s) * bin({RIPotential},1)
| extend vmCount = bin({RIPotential},1)
| project reservationTerm_s, vmCount, commitmentCost, currencyCode_s, savingsPercentage
content.title: Estimated Commitment and Savings
